messages.title: Hope not fear
messages.content: When we stand together, we can achieve so much more.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes cuts to public services, will fight to save our local NHS.
Committed to life-long learning and will restore Educational Maintenance Allowances.
Supports good local jobs and fair pay.
Wants a Brexit that protects jobs and works for Barnsley.
Plans to combat anti-social behaviour with new controls on police.

mentions.candidate: Judy Maciejowska believes in a different kind of politics.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit - we need a Brexit that protects jobs and works for Barnsley.
issues.economy: Supports good local jobs and fair pay.
issues.health: Will fight to save our local NHS.
issues.immigration: Judy's stance on immigration is to keep families together, with humane controls that would allow the UK to thrive.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was born here, I was raised here, and my children were born here too.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked in public services all her life, strives to be on the front lines to save public services.

images.caption: Judy participating in a public service event.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Judy stresses the importance of protection of jobs, families, and public services, focusing on local and practical issues affecting the constituency of Barnsley Central.
